issue.title: [Rust] Use rustfmt to format source code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2378](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2378). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should use rustfmt to format the Rust code.

<https://github.com/rust-lang-nursery/rustfmt>

In Travis we should run `rustfmt diff` and fail the build if there are differences.
